XIII.ii.5.A.1.e
.
Wording on Certification of Disability Rating of Record
Use the following wording on the certificate when responding to inquiries:
Death Cases
:
“The Department of Veterans Affairs has determined that for the purpose of Public Law 586, 81st Congress, as amended, the death of
[name]
from
[cause]
on
[date]
was (not) caused by wounds or injuries received or disease contracted or aggravated in active service.
Disability Cases
:
“
The Department of Veterans Affairs has determined that for the purpose of Public Law 586, 81st Congress, as amended,
[name]
has (does not have) disability evaluated at 100 percent caused by wounds or injuries received or disease contracted or aggravated in active service
.”
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 5, Section A - Certification for Service Academy Appointment
